4.title: Love on the Rocks
4.plot: Charlene manages to find Truck Stop dancers she can work with and Davonee finally comes clean to her bosses that she's in Miami. Charlene meets with a local promoter who's not pleased with the way she's doing business. Word of this gets back to Linda & Michelle and they drop a bomb on Char.

5.title: Dark Comedy
5.plot: Charlene breaks the news to Alex & Davonee that she's lost the event, which leads to Davonee & Charlene getting into a fight that leaves them battling in the streets. Alex forces Char to take a hard look at her life and why she came to Miami.

6.title: Troubled Waters
6.plot: With a renewed sense of purpose, Char manages to convince Linda and Michelle to give her the event back, but her entire future with the company rests on its success. With Davonee's help, Charlene fights to make her bosses proud. Later, Maisi loads all of her friends on a boat and takes them to a deserted island.

imdb.plot outline: Gimme Sugar is going to sexy, sizzling Miami! With the success of Truck Stop, West Hollywood's hottest Friday night party for women, Charlene takes on her biggest challenge yet. She has just a few short weeks to launch a Truck Stop night in the Miami scene. Charlene leaves the comfort of her LA friends behind and moves into a fabulous South Beach condo with a new roommate named Hilary. Through Hilary, Char meets and falls in love with a whole new group of Miami friends: Angel, Maisi, Jazmin, and Gaby. The girls help Charlene navigate the scene and support her in her endeavor, but not without a whole lot of their own personal dramas to add to the mix. Along the way, Charlene butts heads with Omar, one of the hottest promoters in Miami. In times like these, she wishes she had her friends Alex and Davonee there to help.
